response.original_title: Shao Lin Shi Zhi De Bao Chuan Qi
response.overview: Shi Zhi De Bao is an innkeeper who has no lice, and every day, together with his brothers and sisters, I pretend to be a general to save people to lead guests to my station. Unfortunately one day the drama was exposed, an old monk hindered his business. Not only that, the second history of Linh Chau, Ha Kieu, killed the mandarin and then blamed De Bao for his treasure treasure. One night, De Bao became a wanted criminal, his son lost his life, because in revenge, De Bao followed the monk to learn martial arts. From here opens a thrilling journey of enlightenment.
response.title: Shao Lin Shi Zhi De Bao Chuan Qi

results.name: Shao Lin Shi Zhi De Bao Chuan Qi Official Trailer | 少林寺之得宝传奇
